title: "The Gobbler" Thanksgiving Leftover Sandwich
short_description: The ultimate post-Thanksgiving creation, piling all the best leftovers into one epic sandwich.

instructions.step: Lightly toast slices of hearty bread.
Spread a thin layer of mayonnaise or leftover gravy on one slice of bread.
Layer generously with sliced turkey and a scoop of stuffing.
Optional: Add a slice of cheese like provolone or a bit more gravy.
Place the other slice of bread on top and slice in half.
